alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 15 at 6:34PM CDT until May 18 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Lake Creek at Sendera Ranch Road affecting Montgomery County. San Bernard River near Boling affecting Fort Bend, Wharton and Brazoria Counties. Sandy Creek near Cordele affecting Jackson, Wharton and Colorado Counties. Lavaca River near Edna affecting Jackson County. For the West Fork San Jacinto River...including Sendera Ranch Road, Humble...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the San Bernard River...including East Bernard, Boling...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Sandy Creek...including Cordele...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Lavaca River...including Edna...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lake Creek at Sendera Ranch Road. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM CDT Sunday, May 14 the stage was 133.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 144.3 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 138.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 151.0 feet on 08/28/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Lake Creek Sendera Ranch Roa 138.0 133.0 Sun 1 pm CDT 137.6 133.0 129.8 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 645 AM CDT.
